summary: This document is a forwarded email chain from April 3, 2019, in which a victim of Jeffrey Epstein reaches out to an FBI agent, thanking them for their past support and expressing a desire to discuss ongoing efforts to seek justice. The email references past meetings in Australia and the continued failure of justice.

persons.name: Jason Richards
persons.role: Person present during past meeting with FBI agent and victim
persons.context: Mentioned by the victim as someone who was present when the FBI agent came to Australia to discuss the Epstein matter and the abuse.

connections.description: Both were present during a meeting with an FBI agent in Australia to discuss the Epstein matter and abuse.

events.title: Victim's Outreach to FBI Agent
events.description: A victim of Jeffrey Epstein sends an email to an FBI agent, thanking them for past support and seeking to discuss ongoing efforts for justice.

events.title: Past Meeting in Australia
events.description: An FBI agent traveled to Australia to meet with the victim and Jason Richards to discuss Epstein's abuse and the involvement of co-conspirators.

keyFacts: A victim of Jeffrey Epstein directly contacted an FBI agent via personal email in April 2019.
The victim references a past meeting in Australia with the agent and an associate, Jason Richards, to discuss Epstein's abuse and co-conspirators.
The victim expresses that the failure of justice is ongoing and that bringing 'Epstein and Co.' to justice requires victims to have their voices heard.
The email was forwarded through FBI channels, indicating official awareness of the victim's communication.
